Header: One Killed, 10 Injured In Bus-Lorry Crash
Content: A fatal accident occurred on Ratnapura-Pelmadulla Main Road early this morning (02) when a private bus and a lorry had a head on collision, Police media sources reports. A total of 11 people who got injured were admitted to Ratnapura Hospital. One of the victims has died after being hospitalized. The deceased was a 31-year-old resident of Namunukula area. Police is conducting further investigations into the incident.
